page_content: The page discusses the winning project for a new civil protection training center in Meiersboda, planned for construction in Spring 2025.
The page provides information on withholding tax, including the use of "SofTax QUEST" software for tax accounting.
The page provides information on inheritance and gift taxes, including the use of "SofTax GR Spezialsteuern" software for tax declarations.
The page discusses the potential for connecting the Engadin Airport to the World Economic Forum in Davos.
The page informs about a cycling race in Ilanz and the associated traffic restrictions.
